hero.intro: I specialize in building dynamic web applications with a focus on front-end and back-end integration.

about.title: Introduction
about.subTitle: Overview
about.description:
With nearly four years of comprehensive experience in both frontend and backend development, I have honed my skills in creating efficient, scalable, and user-friendly applications. My expertise lies in frontend frameworks such as React, Angular, and Vue, as well as backend development with Laravel.

My career has taken me from Italy to Australia, where I have continuously grown as a developer, embracing diverse challenges and delivering innovative solutions. Integrated frontend interfaces with backend actions to create cohesive and functional web applications.

I look forward to join a collaborative team where I can contribute innovative solutions to challenging problems and work together to achieve exceptional results.

experience.title: What I have done so far
experience.subTitle: Work Experience

works.title: My work
works.subTitle: Projects
works.description: Following some projects showcase my skills and experience through real-world examples of my work. It reflects my ability to work with different technologies, solve problems and manage projects effectively.
